detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket .

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elastication at the back of the waist and hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jeans in washed stretch denim with a glittery print on one pocket and at the hems. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams. Detachable hood with an elastic drawstring, press-studs down the front and reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams. Detachable hood with an elastic drawstring, press-studs down the front and reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric, a lined hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and side sections. Partly lined.

Lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying functional rustle fabric designed for running with a stand-up collar with an elastic drawstring at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip, airholes under the arms and elasticated cuffs. Seam with an elastic drawstring at the back of the waist, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
